mapper.sql: select id, name, title, menu_type, parent_id, ancestors, sort_num, path, component, link_url, is_iframe, is_link, is_keep_alive, is_hide, is_affix, status, perms, icon, remark, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from usc_menu
mapper.select: select distinct t1.* from usc_menu t1 left join usc_role_menu t2 on t1.id = t2.menu_id left join usc_user_role t3 on t2.role_id = t3.role_id left join usc_role t4 on t3.role_id = t4.id where t3.user_id = #{userId} and t1.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and t1.status = 1 AND t4.status = 1 order by t1.parent_id, t1.sort_num

select distinct m.perms from usc_menu m left join usc_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join usc_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join usc_role r on r.id = ur.role_id where m.status = 1 and r.status = 1 and ur.user_id = #{userId}
